responsibilities: Advise various research teams on permissible data usage and partner with them on data sourcing strategy.
Translate data needs between research teams and legal/policy stakeholders.
Maintain and evolve guidelines, policies, and controls around data acquisition and use to address legal risks and regulatory requirements.
Monitor regulatory developments related to AI training data and adapt internal policies and practices.
Engage with academics, industry groups, and other stakeholders to develop norms and best practices around data governance for AI development.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on data governance, legal compliance, and regulatory monitoring related to AI training data. Fine-tuning and customization of language models involve technical tasks related to model training and optimization, which are not directly related to the legal and policy-oriented responsibilities described. Therefore, this activity is not relevant to the job responsibilities.

category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
analysis: The job responsibilities do not mention tasks related to crafting or refining prompts for language models. Instead, they emphasize data governance, legal compliance, and regulatory monitoring. Prompt engineering is a technical task focused on optimizing model outputs, which does not align with the legal and policy focus of the job responsibilities.
